name: Pong!!
description:
A basic 2-players Pong. The first player who get 7 points, win the game.

New on v1.0:

-Added Menu

-Added Replay & Quit Options when you finish a match.

New on v1.0.1:

-Added eRepublik version game

CONTROLS:

-Player 1:

W -> UP

S -> Down

-Player 2:

Up Arrow -> UP

Down Arrow -> DOWN
